RelatedSentence: Slimmers have joined forces to spring - clean their wardrobes to donate 110 bags of their unwanted clothes to help raise funds for a charity .

A1: all their unwanted clothes , shoes and accessories
RelatedSentence: Members of the Dagenham & Barking Slimming World groups collected all their unwanted clothes , shoes and accessories to donate to their local Cancer Research UK shop to support The Big Slimming World Clothes Throw campaign which ran for two weeks from May 5 .
The campaign is a nationwide fundraising drive that sees Slimming World members across the UK donating clothes to Cancer Research UK , Slimming World 's charity partner for 2014 .
The campaign is a nationwide fundraising drive that sees Slimming World members across the UK donating clothes to Cancer Research UK , Slimming World 's charity partner for 2014 .
Last year slimmers donated £888,586 worth of stock across the UK .
All profits go to support the charity 's life - saving work to help beat cancer sooner .

Lynda Gray , slimming world consultant , said : Members of Slimming World group have really embraced this fabulous fundraising campaign and they have been more than happy to donate their ' big ' clothes because they know that they 're never going to need them again .
